title: SOLD: 1907 Morgan Red Belts Miller Huggins SGC
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1907 Morgan Red Belts Miller Huggins SGC
posts.post_content:
[url=https://flic.kr/p/ZCRrdj][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4575/37829374934_51e93d569c_c.jpg[/img][/url]

Rare Morgan Red Belts postcard of Miller Huggins, with a population of just four -- and he is the only identified player featured in this entire 12 card set.  The card is downgraded due to it being postally used -- with a postmark from January 1908.  The front is nice, has no writing on the front of the card and decent corners, no wrinkles.  Email or PM if interested.
Still available and considering the one in Heritage tonight is over $750 with tax and shipping, this one is a great deal.
